column4: Can someone help me troubleshoot Samaba? I followed the official guide for file sharing so that I can join MSHOME and see the PCs running windows on the network but i can't see anything, where do I look for any problems? I have no clue.
did you configure the smb.conf file?
if its a local network, then it should show the files pretty quickly
i'm not sure whta you're talking about.
about configuring the smb.conf file.
sudo nano /etc/samba/smb.conf
what do i do next?
you see a file loaded, right?
yes I can see the config file.
scroll down until you see "workgroup"
change that to whatever network you connect to from windows
so the line should be "workgroup = networknamehere"
it's workgroup = MSHOME as it should be.
here's another thing, when I try to set a smbpaswd it says connection to local host timed out...
press ctrl+w and then search for [homes]
found homes...browseable = yes
the PC running XP can see my computer, I just can't see any pcs over here...
the xp PC can see my computer but when i try to access it, it says network path not found.
i have the same problem lol ;D ;x
something to do with updates? some other ppl I know also have similiar problems.
anyway, thanks for your help =)
